control.description-key: This control converts any dataset that has start date and end date in its records into Schedule Board

property.name: name
property.description-key: Label of record on the board

property.name: startdate
property.description-key: Start DateTime of record on the board

property.name: enddate
property.description-key: End DateTime of record on the board

property.name: color
property.description-key: Color of record on the board

property.name: description
property.description-key: Description of record on the board

property.name: hyperlink
property.description-key: Hyperlink URL of record on the board

property.name: startdate_label
property.description-key: Label for the start date field

property.name: enddate_label
property.description-key: Label for the end date field

property.name: tooltip_color
property.description-key: Hexadecimal color code for tooltip background (e.g., #2c3e50)

property.name: language
property.description-key: Language for calendar labels (en for English, es for Spanish)

property.name: font_size
property.description-key: Font size in pixels for the calendar text (e.g., 14)

property.name: hyperlink_name
property.description-key: Field to use for hyperlink text instead of URL
